description: Formal definition of a concept, quantity or term.
Mathematical or logical derivation, showing how an equation or relation is obtained.
Worked example, numerical calculation or illustrative case demonstrating the use of a concept or equation.
Task or problem posed to the reader, usually without a full solution in the same chunk.
Qualitative explanation, interpretation or discussion of concepts, assumptions or results.
Summarizing or concluding text, highlighting the main points of a section or chapter.
